name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Jiangxi non-staff personnel had their passports and Hong Kong and Macau passes confiscated, and were prohibited from leaving the country by their leaders. I can't help but complain that for this salary of more than 3,000 yuan, they have lost their freedom

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A physical education teacher at a primary school in Hangzhou sexually harassed several junior high school students, and his leader verbally criticized him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, in Nanjing, a woman took an online taxi and asked to drive the car into the community after arriving at the destination. The driver was unwilling and started an argument. The woman called her husband and said that she was bullied. Then her husband came with a wrench and hit the online taxi driver on the head in the street. It is reported that the party involved has paid 35,000 yuan as compensation, but some netizens insist that in addition to financial compensation, the offender must be punished by law. On the afternoon of the 27th, the local police responded: The driver has been sent to the hospital, and the case is currently under investigation and evidence collection. Other details are inconvenient to disclose.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, in Taiyuan, Shanxi, a child was electrocuted and fainted in the water after a heavy rain. Witnesses said that the child's family was not around at the time and no one dared to rescue him until the water receded before sending him to the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, in front of Taishan People's Hospital in Jiangmen, Guangdong, a drunk woman drove a Tesla and crashed into a guardrail, losing control of her emotions and yelling at passers-by and police, "If I don't lock it, I'm going to kill you all."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "The good life we have today has only lasted a few years"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The missing child has been found.
Some netizens found through searching that the suspect Yang Ruixue is not only a Beijing NPC representative, but also the director of the General Office of the National People's Congress, the director of the Retired Cadres Bureau of the General Office of the National People's Congress, and the president of the Democratic and Legal Publishing House.
Her husband is the deputy director of CCTV, the party secretary and director of the Central News Record Film Studio.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported online that Chongqing Bishan District has set up a special working group for "sell off everything". The online document shows that the working group is responsible for the "sell off everything" work in the district. The media learned from the Bishan District Finance Bureau that the "sell off everything" working group has begun to operate. However, it is not just Chongqing, the four words "sell off everything" have long appeared in the work reports or documents of many local governments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 27, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. An old man claimed to be disabled and kept hitting passengers with an umbrella, demanding that they give up their seats. "You don't have any elderly people in your family, you don't have a father or mother, you don't have grandparents, they are all dead."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 25, Jinzhong, Shanxi. It was reported online that Shuanglin Plasma Donation Center in Heshun County invited students to donate plasma four times or more in two and a half months with a 200 yuan "student subsidy".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, a netizen posted that she asked several boys, but they didn't know that the golden hoop was hidden in Sun Wukong's ear, and suspected that they were spies. Many netizens left messages about the "500,000" that might exist around them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/GpgC94UGgC

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 11 (Released), Weifang, Shandong. A woman posted a video saying that Shandong Zhucheng dumped highly toxic chemical waste near her home, causing the death of her grandfather, parents and sister, and 36 villagers were injured and hospitalized. The court shielded the perpetrators and ignored the evidence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 28, Tianjin. The workers of Jiangmen Hangtong Shipbuilding Co., Ltd. of CCCC Fourth Navigation Engineering Bureau have been on strike to demand their wages after owing them several months’ wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 28, Guangzhou, Guangdong. The section of the road where the "Xiangjie S9 flying slope incident" occurred is being repaired. Previously, the section had not been repaired for many years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 28, in Dalian, Liaoning, a plane fell in the middle of the road in the Jinshitan Tourist Resort due to a suspected malfunction. A passerby took a photo and was scolded by the police, "Stop taking photos!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 25, Guilin, Guangxi. Two foreigners in Qixing District beat up a Chinese at the door of the police station. The police station said: The person who was beaten did not report the case. On August 27, a blogger simply forwarded this news and received a call from the police. The other party asked him to delete the forwarded post and said it was false information.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens investigated the closure of shops along the street near Huilongguan in Beijing.
Among the 663 shops in total, 99 were closed or about to close and were seeking to rent or sell, with an abnormal rate of about 14.9%.
There were many shops that closed down, such as tobacco, alcohol, and tea, while there were no abnormalities in the operation of shops such as lottery stations.
Among the shops that closed down was the well-known mid-range restaurant Emei Restaurant. The lawyer's letter showed that it owed 320,000 yuan in water, electricity, and property fees, and 4.408 million yuan in rent and late payment fees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, in Songkou Town, Yongtai, Fujian, local residents reported that in 2017, the local area was demolished to build a highway, but the resettlement problem has not been solved until today, and the temporary transition houses have become dangerous and uninhabitable.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 24, 2024, on Juneyao Airlines flight HO2382 from Guiyang to Shanghai, a one-year-old baby was taken to the bathroom by two female passengers to "set rules" because he continued to cry during the flight. In the video, the woman yelled at and threatened the baby.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on August 27, starting from the autumn semester this year, all primary and junior high schools across the country will use the newly revised unified textbooks. The history textbooks have added content such as the Sino-Indian border war and the Sino-Vietnamese war, while the Chinese textbooks have added chapters that reflect socialist culture, such as "The Light of Youth" which reflects the deeds of Huang Wenxiu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 28, Guangdong. A man posted a video saying that he was sued by another party for "making me pay 1 million yuan" just because he posted videos of Zeekr cars spontaneously catching fire across the country on social platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 27, Changsha, Hunan. A woman wearing a kimono in Songya Lake Wetland Park was boycotted by onlookers. "Your wearing of this dress affects our mood and our national sentiment. Please understand what kind of city Changsha is."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 26, Central News Agency quoted Kyodo News as saying that North Korea had earlier sent an email to the International Frequency Management Agency, expressing its opposition to China's establishment of telecommunications facilities near the border between the two countries. Kyodo News said that it was rare for Pyongyang to express its dissatisfaction with Beijing through diplomatic means.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 28, Jiangxi. The lawyer appointed by Li Peixia's family disclosed the latest developments in Li Peixia's case: On August 21, the lawyer came to Shangrao City Detention Center to meet with Li Peixia, and the meeting lasted only ten minutes. The complaint was fruitless, and the local government has arranged for a government-appointed lawyer to leave.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 28, Yi Shenghua, the lawyer who exposed the theft and sale of corpses, posted a message saying, "A colleague of mine at the law firm was summoned by the Public Security Bureau of Wanbailin District, Taiyuan City, Shanxi Province, because of some shocking news I posted some time ago. He has not come out since 2:30 pm, and the phone is unreachable." Yi Shenghua said, "This matter has nothing to do with him. If you have the guts, come to me!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, the UN Human Rights Office called on China to comprehensively review its legal framework on national security and counter-terrorism. It also stated that the UN Human Rights Team visited China in June this year, especially on the Xinjiang issue, and the OHCHR learned that many problematic laws and policies still exist. They will continue to pay close attention to China's current human rights situation, despite limited access to information and concerns that individuals who contact the United Nations will be retaliated against.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 25, CCTV.com released a video titled "Why Putin remained calm when Ukrainian troops attacked across the border."
Netizens joked that it was "a bit like the Global Times back then."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 27, Xinjiang. A woman was kind enough to help a child find his family, but the child’s grandmother thought she was a bad person. “Do you want to follow anyone who takes you? You can’t tell the difference between good and bad people, and you didn’t even know that the human traffickers took you away.” People around her kindly came to her rescue: “I can testify for her.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 27, a former NHK Chinese employee named "treetalk" posted a microblog to report that he was safe. He said, "I am in my motherland."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The flag-raising ceremony of the Shanxi Sports Games played the national flag anthem of the Republic of China by mistake
August 6, Xiyang, Shanxi. At the opening flag-raising ceremony of the Jinzhong City Primary and Secondary School Track and Field Competition held locally, the national flag anthem of the Republic of China "Blue Sky, White Sun, Red Earth" was used as background music when the flag of the Jinzhong City Primary and Secondary School Track and Field Competition was raised.
As of now, the relevant video has been removed by local media.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Full version (3 minutes 40 seconds)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, it was reported that a blogger named "Yuexiu E-commerce" who was engaged in the cross-border e-commerce industry was arrested. The reason was suspected to be related to his comments. It is reported that the blogger has been posting some content related to grassroots livelihood and social issues on social platforms. A colleague sent him a message, but he has not received a reply. The blogger's latest video was published on August 21.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 28, the Suzhou Intermediate People's Court opened a trial for human rights lawyer Yu Wensheng. More than 10 diplomats went to Suzhou to listen to the trial process, but they were all prohibited from entering. At the same time, two Chinese lawyers, Wang Yu and Yang Hui, were taken away by the police upon arriving in Suzhou.
Yu Wensheng (November 11, 1967-) is a Beijing business lawyer who has represented many Falun Gong practitioners in defense cases and many human rights lawyers arrested in the "709 Crackdown".
Last April, EU High Representative for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy Borrell and German Foreign Minister Berbock visited China. Yu Wensheng and Xu Yan were invited to meet at the German Embassy. On the way, they were intercepted by several plainclothes police officers and were subsequently detained by the authorities and charged with "inciting subversion of state power". They have been detained for 17 months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 18, Zhengzhou, Henan. A man posted a video saying that his bicycle had been lost for 157 days and has not been found since he reported it to the police.
On August 27, the man deleted the video he had posted before, saying that he had been called in for questioning two days ago and was not allowed to look for it. The man said, "I suddenly feel that my life is really a failure."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Report on August 27: To help Pakistani brothers in urgent need, 172,800 Chinese eggs arrived in Pakistan. This was ridiculed by many netizens. One netizen replied, "The victims of the Huludao earthquake can't even eat eggs now."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 28, Hong Kong. At the construction site on Ko Shing Road in Yau Tong, workers hung banners outside the site saying "Give me back my hard-earned money" due to wage arrears. Some workers blocked the road surface with debris, causing traffic to be blocked for a time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Caution]
On August 28, a stabbing incident occurred in Gaomi, Weifang, Shandong.
Two men had an argument, and then one man chopped off the other man's neck with a machete.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Employees from enterprises and institutions across the country discussed their situations of being owed wages, having their wages cut, and having their housing fund payments stopped.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens have begun to call on everyone to unite and speak out bravely on social platforms.
